resources.string: Welcome to a brand new festival that will take place on July 22 and 23.\n Two days fulls of good music where we will be able to enjoy the best of the international scene.
Ticket sales and more information coming soon...
Do you have any question? Send us a message and we will reach you as soon as possible.

System of a Down (also known as SoaD) is an Armenian American heavy metal band formed in Glendale, California, in 1994. The band has sold over 12 million records worldwide, while two of their singles, \"Aerials\" and \"Hypnotize,\" reached number one on Billboard\'s Alternative Songs chart.
Slipknot is an American alternative metal band formed in 1995 in Des Moines, Iowa, United States. They come to present their latest album titled \"The End So Far\".

"Korn is an American nu-metal band from Bakersfield, California, United States, formed in 1993. They are considered the pioneers of the nu metal genre along with Deftones. Like other bands of the time, they were the ones that inspired many of the nu metal and alternative metal bands between the 90s and early 2000s.

Tool is an American progressive metal band that emerged in 1990 in Los Angeles, California. They have sold more than thirteen million albums only in the United States and have produced successful albums that have achieved high levels of sales thanks to their cult status in the music world.
Nickelback is one of the most commercially successful Canadian groups, having sold over 60 million copies worldwide. They are coming to present their latest album \"Get Rollin\'\".
Papa Roach is an American rock band from Vacaville, California, formed in 1993. They come to present their eleventh studio album \"Ego Trip\".

In Flames is a Swedish heavy metal band, formed in Gothenburg in 1990. Alongside At the Gates and Dark Tranquillity, In Flames pioneered the genres known as Swedish death metal and melodic death metal.

Bring Me the Horizon (abbreviated BMTH) is a British rock band from Sheffield, England. With their most recent album \"Amo\" they have experimented with new sounds such as Electropop or Power Pop, and combinations between other electronic genres.

Stone Sour is an American rock band formed in Des Moines, Iowa, in 1992. Stone Sour earned the group two Grammy Award nominations, both for Best Metal Performance, for the singles \"Get Inside\", in 2003, and \"Inhale\", in 2004. From their album \"Come What(ever) May\", the group received another Grammy Award nomination for Best Metal Performance.
Disturbed is a heavy metal and nu metal band formed in Chicago, Illinois. They have won various accolades, having 1 silver record, 19 platinum records, 2 gold singles, and 1 platinum single.
